column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR I-75N AT EXIT 113 (PARIS PIKE):
column4: The exit ramp is shut down until further notice due to an overturned wide load.

The entrance ramp from Athens Boonesboro Rd to I-75S is also shut down.
